woocommerce-subscriptions.notes: Native subscriptions available for standard use cases. Recharge for advanced logic.

woocommerce-memberships.target: Classic Information Systems (Membership App) or MemberStack
woocommerce-memberships.notes: Requires third-party app for equivalent functionality.

advanced-custom-fields.notes: Use Metafields for custom data. Use Shared Variant Modifiers for UI-impacting custom fields.

yoast-seo.notes: BigCommerce has excellent native SEO. Use Meta Tags and SEO fields.
